attributes.action: Are you fed up being ripped off on Electricity and Gas ?
attributes.additional_details:
We as subjects of the United Kingdom are fed up to the back teeth of being ripped off by greedy Foriegn Controlled Energy Suppliers .
Its about time this government took Sole Control over the supply of Energy in this country and provided a fair and affordable supply to its Subjects throughout the Country.
Sign here if you wish the Government to Re-privatise the Electricity and Gas Providers in the UK
